verses.verse: To the chief Musician <S%H5329><s%> on Neginoth <S%H5058><s%>, Maschil <S%H4905><s%>, A Psalm of David <S%H1732><s%>, when the Ziphims <S%H2130><s%> came <S%H935><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> to Saul <S%H7586><s%>, Doth not David <S%H1732><s%> hide <S%H5641><s%> himself with us? Save <S%H3467><s%> me, O God <S%H430><s%>, by thy name <S%H8034><s%>, and judge <S%H1777><s%> me by thy strength <S%H1369><s%>.
Hear <S%H8085><s%> my prayer <S%H8605><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>; give ear <S%H238><s%> to the words <S%H561><s%> of my mouth <S%H6310><s%>.

For strangers <S%H2114><s%> are risen up <S%H6965><s%> against me, and oppressors <S%H6184><s%> seek <S%H1245><s%> after my soul <S%H5315><s%>: they have not set <S%H7760><s%> God <S%H430><s%> before them. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
Behold, God <S%H430><s%> is mine helper <S%H5826><s%>: the Lord <S%H136><s%> is with them that uphold <S%H5564><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%>.
He shall reward <S%H7725><s%> <S%H7725><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> unto mine enemies <S%H8324><s%>: cut them off <S%H6789><s%> in thy truth <S%H571><s%>.
I will freely <S%H5071><s%> sacrifice <S%H2076><s%> unto thee: I will praise <S%H3034><s%> thy name <S%H8034><s%>, O LORD <S%H3068><s%>; for it is good <S%H2896><s%>.
For he hath delivered <S%H5337><s%> me out of all trouble <S%H6869><s%>: and mine eye <S%H5869><s%> hath seen <S%H7200><s%> his desire upon mine enemies <S%H341><s%>.
